All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Chromosome
The Chromosome used in the Genetic Algorithm in this project represents a String created with a collection of genes(characters) taken from ascii (0-126).
Crossover
This is an Interface for Crossover operation.
CrossoverFactory
This a factory class which returns different types of crossovers
EliteGA
This class is for setting the Elite Strategy for the genetic algorithm We use constructor to set the Strategy.
EliteGAFactory
Factory for creating the EliteGA object
GA
 
GAFactory
Abstract class for creating various GA Strategies, creation of GA object is done by the child class.
Mutation
This is an Interface for Mutation operation.
MutationFactory
This a factory class which returns different types of crossovers*
NonEliteGA
This class is for setting the Non-Elite Strategy for the genetic algorithm We use constructor to set the Strategy.
NonEliteGAFactory
Abstract class for creating various GA Strategies, creation of GA object is done by the child class.
OnepointCrossover
The OnepointCrossover class implements one of the Crossover criteria used in the Genetic Algorithm.
Population
The Population class is a Singleton class with a private constructor and a static Instance of itself.
RandomResetMutation
The RandomResetMutation class implements one of the Mutation criteria used in the Genetic Algorithm.
RankSelection
The RankSelection class implements one of the Selection criteria used in the Genetic Algorithm.
RouletteWheelSelection
The RouletteWheelSelection class implements one of the Selection criteria used in the Genetic Algorithm.
Runner
 
Selection
This is an Interface for Crossover operation.
SelectionFactory
This a factory class which returns different types of crossovers*
SwapMutation
The SwapMutation class implements one of the Mutation criteria used in the Genetic Algorithm.
UniformCrossover
The UniformCrossover class implements one of the Crossover criteria used in the Genetic Algorithm.
Utilities
This is the Utilities class of the project.
Utilities.CROSSOVERS
The Enum CROSSOVERS represents the collection of Crossover Types implemented in the project used in various modes of Genetic Algorithm strategies.
Utilities.MUTATIONS
The Enum MUTATIONS represents the collection of Mutation Types implemented in the project used in various modes of Genetic Algorithm strategies.
Utilities.REPLACEMENT
The Enum REPLACEMENT represents the collection of Replacement Types implemented in the project used in various modes of Genetic Algorithm strategies.
Utilities.SELECTIONS
The Enum SELECTIONS represents the collection of Selection Types implemented in the project used in various modes of Genetic Algorithm strategies.
